selection.desc: N fingers of left hand = N words, just place the cursor on the word (index = 1 word)
Index + thumb, start with a pinch, then separate them to select
Use both indicies, start with a slightly close position, then separate them to start selecting
Make a fist with the right hand to grab the word, then move
Move the right index down to cut it
Double tap with the right index, move to select, then tap to end the selection
Start with a pinch to indicate the start of selection, then part the index and thumb away and move to select, then pinch to indicate the end to selection
Double tap with the right index to select single item

gestures.desc: After selecting, use the right index to move it
Move the whole hand(s) while in selection position and move hands away after placing in the right position
Move the right hand, forming a fist for selection, then open it to release
Point with the right index and move to target place
Move the right index up to paste it (move down to cut it)
Pinch and then move the hand while in pinch form, then release in target place by relaxing the index and thumb fingers
